name: The Save Scum
description:
Created for the 4th Brackeys game jam

Ever had the troubles of Bad RNG? so much so that you would edit your save files?

Look no further, as the greatest Save Scum in the universe  challenges the depths of the dungeon.

Each enemy might be random, but they plan several steps ahead of you! Even if you, for some reason, step back in time, their plan of action won't change!
